citation: Traffic (Compliance and Enforcement) Amendment (Personal Mobility Devices) Regulations 2021 (Tas)
text:
Traffic (Compliance and Enforcement) Amendment (Personal Mobility Devices) Regulations 2021

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Traffic Act 1925 .

29 November 2021

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Traffic (Compliance and Enforcement) Amendment (Personal Mobility Devices) Regulations 2021 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on the day on which their making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Regulations
    In these regulations, the Traffic (Compliance and Enforcement) Regulations 2017 are referred to as the Principal Regulations.

4.
    The amendments effected by this regulation have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Traffic (Compliance and Enforcement) Regulations 2017 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 1 December 2021

These regulations are administered in the Department of State Growth.
